episodes.title: How Diddy DESTROYED Craig Mack’s Career: From Bad Boy Records to Cult Life & His REAL Cause of Death
episodes.description:
In today's video, we'll explore the heartbreaking story of Craig Mack, the "Flava In Ya Ear" rapper who skyrocketed to fame under Diddy's Bad Boy Records before facing betrayal and manipulation. From industry exploitation to being drawn into a religious cult, Craig Mack's tragic downfall is a tale of talent, faith, and ultimate tragedy.

#craigmack #badboyrecords #diddy
